title: Teamcubation - The software factory that also manufactures talent
description: At Teamcubation, we not only develop software; we also incubate the talent that will drive your future projects. We offer a comprehensive service that combines turnkey software development with the training of new members for your team.

centralText.lineOne: We are the first software+team factory.
centralText.lineThree: We build the software you need today while incubating your team of tomorrow.

subTitle.lineOne: All our services are based on real projects, either developing new talent
subTitle.lineTwo: or strengthening your company's current team.

talentIncubation.title: Talent Incubation
talentIncubation.description: We develop custom software while training talent for your team. You get technology and professionals aligned and ready to integrate into your company.

upskilling&reskilling.title: Upskilling y Reskilling
upskilling&reskilling.description: Through on-the-job mentoring and workshops, we drive your team's growth by strengthening skills, incorporating new technologies, and improving processes.

BoosterAI.title: BoosterAIÂ®
BoosterAI.description: In two months, your team will apply AI to its processes, creating solutions aligned with your business challenges. With an intensive and practical approach, AI will start working for your company from day one.

noMoreDevs.centralText: At Teamcubation, we understand that software development is also an opportunity to train future valuable members of your team.

carouselText.itemOne: I can't develop this project without more people
carouselText.itemThree: There's not enough time to train the people I need
carouselText.itemFour: Lack of team prevents us from accepting certain projects
carouselText.itemFive: Our seniors don't have time to train

theWheel.centralText: A tailor-made solution for large companies.
theWheel.centralTextTwo: Success stories with a personal touch.
theWheel.secondaryTextTwo: Discover how we collaborated with Mercado Livre, not only developing software but also developing talents so they can be part of their teams with exceptional results.

itemOne.title: Turnkey software development
itemOne.text: We create customized solutions that meet your specific needs.

itemTwo.title: Training in action
itemTwo.text: Our juniors, who already have programming skills, accelerate the acquisition of experience in real software development through our proprietary methodology and technology, accompanied by our seniors.

itemThree.title: Talent selection
itemThree.text: We jointly choose the juniors that best fit your culture to be part of our team. At the end of the project, you can choose to hire the already trained juniors who meet your standards to permanently incorporate them into your team.

squad.centralText: Technology and methodology to enhance your potential future collaborators.

leaders.title: Our leaders
leaders.leyend: Specialized and trained in your company's technology stack and methodologies, they will ensure that the software meets requirements with quality and will oversee the evolution of developers.

juniors.title: Your future developers
juniors.leyend: Guided by our seniors, they will gain real experience while developing their technical and interpersonal skills and integrating into your corporate culture.

pep.title: Programming Experience Platform.
pep.textLeft: The magic of our methodology is in the data.
pep.textRight: While the team works, we collect and analyze concrete data to evaluate and improve the skills of our junior developers with the help of our Programming Experience Platform (PEP). This allows our seniors to support each one in a personalized way to ensure they align with the culture, methodologies, and technologies of your teams, helping them acquire the necessary experience to join them and be productive from day one.

one.title: Integration into your workflow
one.leyend: PEP connects with tools like GitHub, Jira, Slack, and Teams, facilitating both the software development process and tracking junior progress.

two.title: Real-time insights
two.leyend: Observe the evolution of developers with precise metrics on the code they develop, methodologies, and communication tools.

three.title: Intelligent alerts
three.leyend: Keep us informed about developer performance with notifications that identify behaviors that don't align with expectations, necessary to improve the quality and consistency of work and team.

four.title: Customizable monitoring
four.leyend: We evaluate key aspects of developers' personal development through customized actions and surveys that bring a human approach to the training process.

five.title: Meet your future collaborators
five.leyend: Through cognitive and behavioral tests, such as PDA (Personal Development Analysis), we get a clear view of your future collaborators' profiles to manage their talents, develop skills, and get their best version.

six.title: Emotional pulse
six.leyend: Integration with AI that automatically analyzes responses and detects the team's feelings and emotions to intervene timely when necessary, ensuring a positive and productive work environment.

mariano.leyend: I envision Teamcubation solving the giant problem of companies and offering first job opportunities to thousands of people.

diego.leyend: I envision continuing to grow and scale with excellence

agustin.leyend: I envision Teamcubation being recognized for democratizing access to work in the software industry.

tapi.leyend: I envision Teamcubation setting the comprehensive standard for training and integrating new talent in companies worldwide.

eze.leyend: I envision data, used transparently and collaboratively, being the engine of innovation that will allow us to raise the standard in talent integration worldwide.

flor.leyend: I envision an incredible place to work, where people always want to return.

tomas.leyend: I envision Teamcubation being an exemplary model of operational efficiency, strategic agility, and collaborative culture.

one.title: Tailor-made software
one.leyend: Software developed according to the specific needs and standards of your company.

two.title: Frictionless onboarding
two.leyend: Developers ready to be permanently incorporated into your team, aligned with your company's culture, methodologies, and frameworks.

three.title: Focus on work
three.leyend: Your seniors 100% dedicated to generating results for your business.

five.title: Fluid TA process
five.leyend: Simplifying the selection of both internal and external talents, eliminating pain points.

six.title: Branding
six.leyend: Positive impact on employer brand development and organizational culture.

carouselInfo.centralText: Ready to develop software with your team of the future?

footerText: And since we already work as a team, there are experienced leaders who already know the company's culture and ways of working, when finalizing and transferring developers to your teams, we confirm a new squad to continue ensuring the productive capacity of your organization.

partners.centralText: WHO DO WE WORK WITH TO ENHANCE NEW DIGITAL TALENT?

_team.text: After years in the industry and academia, we felt that a gear was missing that connected the two worlds. The problem is clear and evident, we teach many people, but companies continue to lack people to fill the positions they need to achieve their goals.

text.standardTextOne: If you are a junior, meaning you have already learned but have no professional experience,
text.standardTextTwo: which is where we can help you be selected by a company for a squad.

text.boldTextOne: If you are a developer, have experience, are skilled, and like to transmit knowledge,
text.linkJuniors: this link and apply for the position that best suits your profile,
text.standardTextTwo: which will allow us to understand where we can fit you in Teamcubation.

text.boldText: If you haven't learned to code yet,
text.standardText: we implore you to do so, become a developer, and then come apply! We don't give classes, nor do we have schedules or teachers... Our company works for other companies, allowing you to gain experience if you already know how to code.

options.organization: I am an organization, I want to be contacted to learn more about the service
options.senior: I am a Senior developer and want to accompany Juniors
options.junior: I am a Junior/Trainee developer with programming knowledge
options.no-exp: I don't know how to code and want to learn

submit-response.success: Your message was sent successfully, thank you!
submit-response.error: An error occurred while submitting the form, please try again.

greyText.lineOne: We are a time machine and make you have 2 years of experience in 6 months.

devsJuniors.text: Teamcubation works for companies, companies hire juniors and often ask us for help in finding them. So don't hesitate! Access this link we left here and leave your data so that when companies request profiles, we can forward yours or your information.
devsJuniors.textButton: See open positions from our clients for developers without experience_

blueText.lineOne: If you see beyond the software, beyond the framework, and understand that the key is in people, join Teamcubation:

standardText.lineOne: learn to lead teams, while developing for large companies and transmitting to others what you know.

devsSeniors.textButton: See open positions for experienced developers_
